Member Function Documentation

void pomotuxdatabase::ActivityInventorySheet::InsertActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rNewActivity,
ActivityInventorySheet &  rAIS 
) [virtual]

Method that inserts an Activity in the Activity Inventory Sheet, using ActivityInAIS relation.

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the current database used
rNewActivity a reference to the activity whe have just created
rAIS a reference to the current Activity Inventory Sheet
